channel.title: Motivation on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Motivation on Home

item.title: Create Smarter Goals
item.description: If you are anything like me, passion and self-motivation compels you to generate ambitious goals, perhaps even write them down and share them with your friends and family. Then, you’ll contentedly coddle yourself in the feeling of satisfaction for merely having thought of it. And why shouldn’t you feel good? This new goal belongs to you. It was born from ingeniously intuiting the needed and well deserve value you know will soon add to your life.
